title: Klondike Gold Rush National Historical Park: Current Conditions
body: Explore This Park    Plan Your Visit     Basic Information     Current Conditions             Alerts & Conditions         Alerts    Information        Dyea Flats Road improvement work - possible road closures  Alert 1 , Severity ,information ,, Dyea Flats Road improvement work - possible road closures  May 9 - Sept. 7, 2016:  Road work along the shoulder of the Dyea Flats Road near Dyea townsite.  The road will be open while work happens during the day 7a-7p. From 7p-7a the Dyea Flats and Slide Cemetery roads have restrictions and closures. more          Haul Truck Advisory on Dyea Road  Alert 2 , Severity ,information ,, Haul Truck Advisory on Dyea Road  Trucks are transporting material from Skagway to Dyea Flats along Dyea Road.  Hauling has been scheduled to occur primarily at night to minimize impact to public traffic, but could occur day or night.  Please proceed with caution on the Dyea Road. more            Chilkoot Trail Conditions Read the latest update on trail conditions.  Updated weekly June-August and sporadically in the spring and fall.
